actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to eliminate the requirement that States pay unemployment compensation on the basis of services performed by election workers.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt States from the current requirement of paying unemployment compensation to an election worker if the amount of remuneration reasonably expected to be received by such worker for services as an election worker is less than a specified amount.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to eliminate the requirement that States pay unemployment compensation on the basis of services performed by election workers.
